page.title: 02CLACTON BEACH
page.content: Clacton Beach is one of the reasons why Clacton is so popular. If you like diving there are groynes for diving off.With groynes the sea doesn't go out very far and the beach levels vary.The Gunfleet Sailing Club by the point lets you join in the water activities like windsurfing, yachting and canoeing. The beach is just right for sunbathing enthusiasts and the sand is good for making sandcastles,holes,etc. Dogs are restricted from some beaches. Cyclists are not permitted to cycle on the lower,middle or upper promenade, because they disturb the peace. It is possible to walk along the beach from St. Osyth to the East, to Walton-on-the-Naze in the West.
